toggle.name: Milker
toggle.desc: This switch let you choose how the cattle are milked.

option.name: Hand Milking
option.effect: Gives a milking generally balanced between quantity and quality.
option.desc: Cattle are milked directly by the milkmaid.

level.name: Noob Hand
level.desc: Cattle milked by trainee provide a low milk, in both quality and quantity.

level.name: Hand
level.desc: Cattle milked by apprentice provide a somewhat weak milk but it's still better than trainees.

level.name: Experimented Hand
level.desc: Cattle milked by milkmaid provide a fair milk, in both quality and quantity.

level.name: Professional Hand
level.desc: Cattle milked by expert milkmaid provide a good milk, in both quality and quantity.

level.name: Master Hand
level.desc: Cattle milked by master milkmaid provide a very good milk, in both quality and quantity.

level.name: Devil Hand
level.desc: This demonic hand know exactly how to pleasure cattle to get a milk with an excellent taste.

level.name: God Hand
level.desc: Cattle milked by this heaven hand provide divine milk, in both quality and quantity.

option.name: Machine Milking
option.effect: Gives a milking usually based on quantity.
option.desc: Cattle are milked with the help of machine.

level.name: Milking tool
level.desc: A basic tools make to facilitate the work of milkmaid.

level.name: Milking machine
level.desc: A machine created to increase the production of milk.

level.name: Medical machine
level.desc: A machine created to reduce the stress of the cattle.

level.name: Enjoyment machine
level.desc: A machine created to make the milking more enjoyable for the cattle.

level.name: Alien machine
level.desc: Cattle milked by this machine provide excellent milk, in both quality and quantity.

level.name: Ultimate machine
level.desc: The best machine created by human mind, nothing can beat this quantity.

option.name: Tentacle Milking
option.effect: Gives a milking usually based on quality.
option.desc: Cattle are milked by organic creatures called tentacles.

level.name: Organic Milker
level.desc: A organism created to make the milking more natural for the cattle.

level.name: Living Milker
level.desc: A living thing created to simulate a baby cattle.

level.name: Young Tentacle
level.desc: A little Tentacle with a voracious appetite.

level.name: Tentacle
level.desc: Tentacles are worms like creatures who love milk more than anything.

level.name: Elder Tentacle
level.desc: An enormous tentacle favoring quantity over quality.

level.name: Tentacle Queen
level.desc: Queen of her kind, she produce the milk with the best taste.
